title: BitcoinGirl.Club
author: BitcoinGirl.Club
content: This post is to reply FatFork.It's not the first time I confused myself by my own sin ðŸ¤£Most of the forum boards are in my ignore list and when I visit peoples post history page from my account, I miss the posts from the ignore boards. It needs a habit for me to check from another browser before responding to any such discussions LOLSee how it confused me:It's from the logged in browser.And this is when I am not logged it LOL
